videoSnippet.title: "David vs Goliath" || Watu Kobese vs Peter Leko || FIDE World Championship Tournament (2001/02)
videoSnippet.description:
Search all my videos easy https://agadmator-library.github.io/

0:00 Hello Everyone!
01:15 Game Starts!
02:32 CNG!
09:30 Pause the Video!
13:15 IWITP
15:00 Legends of the Channel! 

Watu Kobese vs Peter Leko
FIDE World Championship Tournament (2001/02), Moscow RUS, rd 1, Jan-13
Caro-Kann Defense: Breyer Variation (B10)

1. e4 c6 2. d3 d5 3. Nd2 e5 4. Ngf3 Bd6 5. Be2 Nf6 6. O-O O-O 7. c3 Re8 8. a4 a5 9. Re1 Nbd7 10. Bf1 h6 11. Qc2 Nf8 12. b3 Ng6 13. Bb2 de4 14. de4 Bc5 15. h3 Nh5 16. Ba3 Ba3 17. Ra3 Nhf4 18. Kh2 Qf6 19. Raa1 Bd7 20. Re3 b5 21. g3 Ne6 22. Rd3 Nc5 23. Rd7 Nd7 24. ab5 Ne7 25. Kg2 Reb8 26. bc6 Nc6 27. Bc4 Rc8 28. Qd3 Nb6 29. Bb5 Ne7 30. c4 Ng6 31. Qc3 Qd8 32. Nf1 Qc7 33. Ne3 Ra7 34. h4 h5 35. Qe1 Rca8 36. Nd5 Qc5 37. Qe2 f6 38. Rd1 Nf8 39. Ne1 Nd5 40. ed5 g6 41. Nd3 Qb6 42. Nb2 Qd6 43. Na4 Rc7 44. Qe3 Rac8 45. Nc3 f5 46. Na4 Nh7 47. Qc3 f4 48. Qa5 fg3 49. fg3 Rf7 50. Qa6 Qf8 51. Qe6 Nf6 52. Rf1 Kg7 53. d6 Rd8 54. c5 e4 55. Nc3 e3 56. Qe3 Rb8 57. Bc4 Ra7 58. Qd4 Re8 59. c6
